mapper.insert: insert into core_Author (AutID, Name, ImgUrl, dr_curOrgName, dr_curOrgID, Address, Email, PortalUrl, PaperListUrl, InsTime, UpdTime, ElsAutID, ElsOrgID, Flag, Pic, dr_CitedCnt, CitedCnt_UpdTime, dr_PaperCnt, PaperCnt_UpdTime, dr_FirstAutCnt, FirstAutCnt_UpdTime, dr_CorrpAutCnt, CorrpAutCnt_UpdTime) values (#{autid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drCurorgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drCurorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portalurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperlisturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{elsautid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elsorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pic,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{drCitedcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{citedcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drPapercnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{papercntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drFirstautcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{firstautcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drCorrpautcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corrpautcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update core_Author set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ImgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr_curOrgName = #{drCurorgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr_curOrgID = #{drCurorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PortalUrl = #{portalurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PaperListUrl = #{paperlisturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InsTime = #{instime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdTime = #{updtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ElsAutID = #{elsautid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ElsOrgID = #{elsorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Flag = #{flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Pic = #{pic,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, dr_CitedCnt = #{drCitedcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CitedCnt_UpdTime = #{citedcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr_PaperCnt = #{drPapercnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PaperCnt_UpdTime = #{papercntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr_FirstAutCnt = #{drFirstautcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FirstAutCnt_UpdTime = #{firstautcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr_CorrpAutCnt = #{drCorrpautcnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CorrpAutCnt_UpdTime = #{corrpautcntUpdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AutID = #{autid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AutID, Name, ImgUrl, dr_curOrgName, dr_curOrgID, Address, Email, PortalUrl, PaperListUrl, InsTime, UpdTime, ElsAutID, ElsOrgID, Flag, Pic, dr_CitedCnt, CitedCnt_UpdTime, dr_PaperCnt, PaperCnt_UpdTime, dr_FirstAutCnt, FirstAutCnt_UpdTime, dr_CorrpAutCnt, CorrpAutCnt_UpdTime from core_Author where AutID = #{autid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
